function RIR_EP04_19()
    -- .結-1【12月第4週】「乱入」
    SaveData.Title = "乱入"

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    -- //SE：戦姫コール
    PLAY_SE("SEf026.wav", 1000, true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0414.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Announcement】
 "Erika Ikusa—! Please come to the stageーーー!!" ]])
    -- //エルメス

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0919.wav")
    MSG([[
    【???】
 "Yes." ]])
    -- //リラ

    MSG([[ I proceed down the dark hallway and step onto the stage. ]])

    MSG([[ The stage, after so long, looks much more radiant than before. ]])

    MSG([[ Just like the stars in the night sky I looked up at on the night of my first date with Minato-kun. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf026.wav",1000)

    -- //BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024da")
    -- //BU：エルメス（通常）
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM15.wav",1000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0415.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ladies & gentlegaaaaarls<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Now, now, now! It’s time for the long-awaited Princess Election!" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0416.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The ones battling for votes today are—my older sister and the academy’s top handsome girl, the princess knight Daria!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0417.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "A superstar who was a big hit even at the Hakuyousai! Now risen to become Yuriai Private Academy’s representative beauty, the battle princess Erika cha……" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-senpai’s words come to a halt. ]])

    MSG([[ And understandably so. Because who appeared in the place Erika was supposed to standーー ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のリラ（決意・対ダリア）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVb001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0375.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "What kind of joke is this? This is not the place for ‘a knight’ like you to stand." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0920.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "There’s nothing strange here, is there? The Princess Election was originally a contest for the title of ‘Princess.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0921.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "A challenger has appeared to take the ‘Princess’ title from you. That’s all there is to it." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0418.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "L-Lira-chanーーーーーーーーーーーーー!!!" ]])

-- SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0419.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Just when you thought Erika-chan would come, lo and behold! Here appears second-year ‘Princess Gal’ Lira Hoozuki, first-year student and future candidate for ‘Princess’ーーー!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0420.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’m truly surprised by this! What’s going to happen now? What should I doーー!?" ]])


STOP_SE("SEf005.wav", 1000)
    -- //SE：手を打つ音
PLAY_SE("SEa018.wav")
--WAIT(600)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0376.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Calm yourself. The simplest solution is to promptly remove Lira-kun and call forth the original candidate Erika-kun." ]])

    MSG([[ When Daria clapped her hands, the murmuring crowd fell silent. ]])

    MSG([[ Furthermore, Daria sent me a disappointed look. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0377.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I’m disappointed in you, Lira-kun. Changing the candidate on the day of the election is absolutely unacceptable." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0922.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Unacceptable? How can you say that with such certainty? There is no clause in the election rules that prohibits a proxy participant." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0378.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Even if it’s not explicitly stated, it’s obvious. Besides, have you gotten approval from the Election Management Committee? You can’t just unilaterally change the sacred Princess Electionーー" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0923.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I got permission from the committee this morning. Because Erika suddenly became unwell, I, the head knight, am running in her place." ]])

    MSG([[ Knowing there are Uraniu faction students in the Election Management Committee, I naturally prepared the groundwork. ]])

    MSG([[ I also completed all the paperwork to be officially recognized as a proxy. ]])

    MSG([[ And above all, I have this strongest ally on my side. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0924.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Proxy participation was also permitted at the 82nd Princess Election. In other words, it’s a precedent recognized by our great seniors." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0925.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "At Yuriai Private Academy, seniority is absolute. Overturning past rulings from our seniors is simply not allowed." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0379.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "…I see. I’m impressed with your knowledge of the Princess Election. Reluctantly, I have no choice but to accept your claim." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0926.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I’m seriously aiming to become a ‘Princess.’ Of course I have past election results memorized." ]])

    MSG([[ This strategy only occurred to me because I was so obsessed with the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ Sensing the Himekami family’s trap, I only consulted with Uran-senpai, quietly arranging behind the scenes to participate as Erika’s proxy. ]])

    MSG([[ If they’d spotted my moves beforehand, they might have blocked me, so the only chance I had was election day. ]])

    MSG([[ It took longer than expected to convince the committee, and contacting Erika was almost too late, but I made it just in time. ]])

    MSG([[ Because even Erika didn’t know, this surprise attack went off without anyone catching on. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0927.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hermes-chan senpai, okay with me participating as a proxy, right? I’m not breaking any rules!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0421.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Sounds fun, so it’s a yes<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    MSG([[ Despite my older sister’s reasonable objections, her little sister, the Princess Emperor, easily accepted my claim. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0422.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "This surprise really shocked me, and more than anything, Lira-chan, your seriousness really comes through!" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0423.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Daria-chan! Please take Lira-chan’s determination seriously!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "…Fine. If Lira-kun loses terribly, we might still be able to drag out Erika-kun." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0928.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 (Well then, the real challenge starts now.) ]])

    MSG([[ I face Daria in the center. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024db")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //CI：ダリアBU（真剣）顔左半分を切り抜き 129
    SET_CUTIN_22_XL(450,300)
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG024db")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,280,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Her furious and hostile gaze makes me want to step back. ]])

    MSG([[ From her expression, I’m certain the Himekami family had laid some kind of trap for Erika. ]])

    MSG([[ They’re seriously angry that I’ve disrupted their plan. Heh, serves them right. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Your spirit of self-sacrifice is admirable, but I will crush you thoroughly. Prepare yourself." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_0929.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Self-sacrifice? I don’t have an ounce of that feeling." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0930.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I’m not just here to protect Erika. I intend to snatch the title of ‘Princess’ from you today!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0931.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Prepare yourself, ‘Princess Knight’ Daria Himegami! The pain you’ve inflicted on my heart will be returned amplified by a billion!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "…Interesting. Show me your resolve, ‘Princess Gal’ Lira Hoozuki!" ]])

    MSG([[ At this point, Erika no longer mattersーー ]])

    MSG([[ My second-ever Princess Election, fought for pride, is finally set to begin. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    RESET_CUTIN_00()
    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_20")
end
